# Every fonctions used for plotting purposes

# plot_add_logo

    

  

```{r example-plot_add_logo}
library(ggplot2)
plot_test = ggplot(data.frame(), aes(x = 1, y = 1)) +
  geom_point()
plot_add_logo(plot = plot_test)
```
